long_description: With mid-range response for amazing control in the park, the Burton Ambush boots combine lightning fast entry and cushioned, comfortable liners for lasting performance. Shrinkage(TM) technology reduces boot's overall footprint by 1 full size, minimizing boot overhang, bulk and weight. Imprint(TM) 3 liners with Focus Cuffs ride higher on the ankles for increased agility and response; liners feature rip-and-stick closures. Liners provide a consistent flex over time and slide on and off feet easily; precurved ankle panels reduce lace pressure on front of legs. Molded EVA footbeds with a supportive shank lessen the blow of hardpack landings; antimicrobial coating fights odors. Streamlined Speed Zone(TM) shell lacing lets you fine-tune the upper and lower zones in seconds; this system offers powerful rebound, wrap and response with minimal effort. Medium-flexing, slim, 3D-molded tongues wrap your forefeet in comfort, offer a seamless flex and reduce performance-robbing shell/liner stack-up. Boots feature strategically placed flex notches that allow smooth, fluid lateral and medial flex, perfect for nose bones and tweaked out tail grab. Flexible backstay spines increase medial/lateral support, edge-to-edge response and durability. Snowproof internal gussets on boot tongues completely seal lower boot zones to keep feet warm and dry. Super lightweight DynoLite EST midsoles/outsoles offer cushioning, improved board feel and consistent support throughout; ultra damping B3 gel inserts cushion feet.
